methods.name: GetAttackLocation
methods.comment: Returns the location we want to originate an attack from

methods.name: GetCurrentAttackTask
methods.comment: Returns the current attack task ( can be nullptr )

methods.name: PerformCustomRadialAttack
methods.comment: Hook for us to be able to go to blueprrint in order to do the custom radial attack

methods.name: OnCurrentAggroTargetReplicated
methods.comment: Called on both server and client when aggro target has changed

properties.name: mCurrentAttack
properties.comment: The current attack that the pawn is issuing @todoai: Verify if clients need this replicated or if the task get a activate on clients too
